summary: Comprehensive testing of JobTracker SaaS application completed. All 27 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing verified all major flows including landing page, authentication, CRUD operations, statistics, and internationalization.

issues: Edit button selector uses lucide-edit-2 icon which may need more specific targeting for automated tests

passed_tests: Backend: Health check endpoint returns healthy status
Backend: Root API endpoint returns version info
Backend: User login with valid credentials
Backend: User login rejection with invalid credentials
Backend: User registration with new email
Backend: Get current user profile with token
Frontend: Landing page loads with MAADEC logo
Frontend: Navigation bar with all links
Frontend: Login page form elements present
Frontend: Login with demo credentials succeeds
Frontend: Dashboard page loads with KPIs
Frontend: Create new application via modal
Frontend: Registration page form elements present
critical_code_review_comments: All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing
Authentication flow is secure with JWT tokens
Internationalization (i18n) is properly implemented for FR/EN
seed_data_creation: Test applications with TEST_ prefix were created and cleaned up after testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features are working. The application supports French (default) and English languages. The sidebar navigation, CRUD operations, statistics with charts, and authentication are all functional. Test data cleanup script is available in the test file.

features_verified.landing_page: MAADEC logo displays, navigation works, language switcher functional
features_verified.authentication: Login and registration forms work correctly
features_verified.dashboard: KPIs display, recent applications and interviews sections work
features_verified.applications_crud: Create, Read, Update, Delete all functional
features_verified.search_filter: Search by company/position works, status filter works
features_verified.statistics: Charts render correctly (line, pie, bar charts)
features_verified.interviews: Page loads, empty state displays correctly
features_verified.settings: Profile and API keys sections display
